description: Real comments from woodhouse-modern PR #18 for testing

pr.title: test: Validate conversational review system with intentional issues
pr.author: stroupaloop

comments.body:
_⚠️ Potential issue_

**Critical security issue: Remove hardcoded API key**

Hardcoded API keys must never be committed to source control.

_⚠️ Potential issue_

**Critical security issue: SQL injection vulnerability**

Direct string interpolation of user input into SQL queries creates a severe security vulnerability.

console.log in Lambda handler

This appears to be CloudWatch logging which is valid for Lambda functions.
